metadata.name: My Dark Life
metadata.description:
Poem I wrote on 03/22/2000. 1st Featured poem of my ebook "20 Years of Darkness.‚Äù

I wrote this poem when I was in a very dark space, struggling with drug addiction. I was 17 years old and growing into an adult with the emotional intelligence of a toddler. Physically and emotionally abused from a young age, exposed to drugs and violence my whole life.

My Dark Life

My life...What can I say?
Eternal darkness and mayhem put me at bay.
I have no control.
My life, it is not mine.
Innocence was never in me.
Darkness is and always will be.
He controls my life.
He raped me of my soul, beliefs and care for humanity.
I've become numb, no life of my own.
My body is a shell of my life as a whole.
Continuing downward...Darkness stalking my soul.
No human compassion.
Darkness is home.
I have no savior, no soul of my own.
Hell is where I should be - burning forever, for the sins of my life.
I wish to be saved, but no one can help me.
I am alone in this darkness. I am all by myself...
